descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i][color=#ffff00]
This is only the GERMAN TRANSLATION of the great original Mod by [b]Billyro, who have given me permission to release it here on NEXUS.

Y[/b]ou can find the original Mod made by Billyro here:[/color] [color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69103/?]Nordic Wanderer Equipment
[/url][/color]
[/i][/size][color=#ffff00][size=3][i]
[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]
1. Donwload, unpack, copy and paste the original files first
2. Then download and unpack my file everywhere outside the game
3. Copy and paste my translated .esp file in the game folder/DATA
4. If asked, then overwrite or replace the original file
5. That's all and have fun!!!


[/i][/size][b][size=3][i]If you like it, then you also endorse the original file, please!!! All credits and rights go to Billyro!!! Many thanks to him!!!

[color=#00ff00][color=#ffff00]Changelog for Update:
During I have searched it as I am playing my modded Skyrim I have found a missing translation "Follow the Eagle's gaze." I have completed this
line in German language now. Excuse me for this little mistake!!!

[b]How to update withe the fix:
Just overwrite the old file you have installed - that's all and have fun!!![/b]

Astra2000[/color] [/color][img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/smile.gif[/img][/i][/size]
[/b][/color]
author: Astra2000
